info.title: Watcher security-critical API
info.description:
API specification of the Watcher's security-critical Service
Error codes are available in [html](https://github.com/omisego/elixir-omg/docs/api_specs/includes/errors.md#error-codes-description) format.

post.summary: Returns information about the current state of the child chain and the watcher.
post.description: The most critical function of the Watcher is to monitor the ChildChain and report dishonest activity. The user must call the `/status` endpoint periodically to check. Any situation that requires the user  to either exit or challenge an invalid exit will be included in the `byzantine_events` field.

allOf.description: The response schema for a successful operation

schema.description: The response schema for an error

allOf.description: The response schema for a successful operation

data.description: The object schema for an error
Something went wrong on the server

post.summary: Gets all utxos belonging to the given address.
post.description: Note that this is a performance intensive call and should only be used if the chain is byzantine and the user needs to retrieve utxo information to be able to exit. Normally an application should use the Informational API's [Account - Get Utxos](http://TODO) instead. This version is provided in case the Informational API is not available.

allOf.description: The response schema for a successful operation

schema.description: The response schema for an error

allOf.description: The response schema for a successful operation

data.description: The object schema for an error
Something went wrong on the server

post.summary: Gets exit data for an in-flight exit.
post.description: Exit data are arguments to `startInFlightExit` root chain contract function.

requestBody.description: Signed transaction RLP-encoded to bytes and HEX-encoded to string

post.summary: Returns a competitor to an in-flight exit.
post.description: Note that if the competing transaction has not been put into a block `competing_txid` and `competing_proof` will not be returned.

requestBody.description: Signed transaction RLP-encoded to bytes and HEX-encoded to string
